text:
1/9 In 1798 Edward Jenner published his report that changed medicine  – “An inquiry into the causes and effects of the variolæ vaccinæ .. cow pox”
 
Today I found out the copy held by @LSHTM is Inscribed at the front: 'Richard Reece'

#COVID19 #vaccine
https://t.co/jCuWBpzxkw https://t.co/7TlWytFmqo
